meanings.definition: Small white scales of dead skin found on the scalp.
meanings.sent1: The dandriffs on his scalp were visible against his dark hair.
meanings.sent2: She brushed away the dandriffs from her shoulders after scratching her head.
meanings.sent3: The dandriffs on his head looked like tiny snowflakes falling.
meanings.sent4: The dandriffs scattered on his shirt like powdered sugar on a cake.
meanings.sent5: The dandriffs on her scalp made her feel self-conscious during the meeting.

meanings.definition: To shed these scales of dead skin from the scalp.
meanings.sent1: He would dandriff constantly, leaving a trail of flakes wherever he went.
meanings.sent2: After using a special shampoo, she noticed she didn't dandriff as much.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to dandriff more when it was shedding its fur.
meanings.sent4: The tree dandriffed its leaves, creating a colorful carpet on the ground.
meanings.sent5: As the snake slithered, it appeared to dandriff its old skin, revealing a shiny new layer underneath.
